mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (m_id, m_name, m_pw, m_phone, m_email, m_katalk) values (#{m_id},#{m_name},#{m_pw},#{m_phone},#{m_email},#{m_katalk})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set m_status = '1' where m_id=#{m_id}
